snippet: Christie’s will auction 21 of Cindy Sherman’s “Untitled Film Stills” in a single lot next month, and those photographs are expected to sell for $6 million to $9 million.
abstract: Carol Vogel Inside Art column; Christie’s is selling 21 of Cindy Sherman’s Untitled Film Stills in single lot during its evening sale of postwar and contemporary art in November; exhibit of artist Maurizio Cattelan's works will open at Sotheby's private selling gallery S/2 in October; several institutions are showcasing works by Ellsworth Kelly, including exhibit at new Fondation Louis Vuitton scheduled to open in Paris in October.
lead_paragraph: Christie’s will auction 21 of Cindy Sherman’s “Untitled Film Stills” in a single lot next month, and those photographs are expected to sell for $6 million to $9 million.

headline.main: Cindy Sherman’s ‘Untitled Film Stills’ Go to Auction
headline.print_headline: Cindy Sherman’s ‘Untitled Film Stills’ Go to Auction
